quizDescription: Test your knowledge about Jay-Z and his remarkable career in the music industry!

questions.question: What is Jay-Z's real name?
questions.explanation: Jay-Z's real name is Shawn Carter.

questions.question: Jay-Z hails from which borough of New York City?
questions.explanation: Jay-Z is from the borough of Brooklyn in New York City.

questions.question: Which Jay-Z album is often considered one of the greatest hip-hop albums of all time?
questions.explanation: Jay-Z's debut album, 'Reasonable Doubt,' released in 1996, is highly regarded as one of the greatest hip-hop albums ever.

questions.question: What is the name of Jay-Z's record label, which he co-founded in 1995?
questions.explanation: Jay-Z co-founded the record label 'Roc-A-Fella Records' in 1995, which played a significant role in his early success.

questions.question: Jay-Z is the owner of which music streaming service, which he acquired in 2015?
questions.explanation: Jay-Z acquired the music streaming service 'Tidal' in 2015 and became its majority owner.

questions.question: Jay-Z has a famous collaboration album with which rapper?
questions.explanation: Jay-Z and Kanye West collaborated on the album 'Watch the Throne,' released in 2011, which received critical acclaim.

questions.question: Which Jay-Z song features the iconic line 'I got 99 problems, but a ___ ain't one'?
questions.explanation: The song '99 Problems' by Jay-Z features the memorable line 'I got 99 problems, but a bitch ain't one.'

questions.question: Jay-Z is known for his entrepreneurial ventures. Which luxury champagne brand did he acquire in 2014?
questions.explanation: In 2014, Jay-Z acquired the luxury champagne brand 'Ace of Spades' (Armand de Brignac), known for its distinctive gold bottles.

questions.question: Which famous singer and actress is Jay-Z married to?
questions.explanation: Jay-Z is married to Beyoncé, one of the world's best-selling music artists and an acclaimed actress.

questions.question: Jay-Z released his thirteenth studio album in 2017, addressing personal and social issues. What is the title of this album?
questions.explanation: Jay-Z's thirteenth studio album, released in 2017, is titled '4:44,' and it garnered critical acclaim for its introspective and socially conscious themes.

questions.question: Which song by Jay-Z features Rihanna and includes the lyrics 'I'ma let you finish, but I got Beyoncé on my mind'?
questions.explanation: The song 'Run This Town' by Jay-Z features Rihanna and Kanye West and includes the lyrics 'I'ma let you finish, but I got Beyoncé on my mind.'

questions.question: Jay-Z is the first hip-hop artist to be inducted into which prestigious organization?
options: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame
questions.explanation: Jay-Z became the first hip-hop artist to be inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 2017.

questions.question: What is the title of Jay-Z's autobiographical film, which was released in 2010 and directed by Ron Howard?
questions.explanation: Jay-Z's autobiographical film, released in 2010 and directed by Ron Howard, is titled 'Fade to Black.'

questions.question: Which Jay-Z song features the famous line 'If you're having girl problems, I feel bad for you, son'?
questions.explanation: The song '99 Problems' by Jay-Z includes the memorable line 'If you're having girl problems, I feel bad for you, son.'

questions.question: Which Jay-Z album earned him a record-setting 11 nominations at the 2004 Grammy Awards?
questions.explanation: Jay-Z's album 'The Blueprint 3,' released in 2009, received a record-setting 11 nominations at the 2004 Grammy Awards.
